settings.title: The (Only) Once-a-Year Subscription Sale
settings.text: Our 25% Off Subscription Sale only happens once a year. Lock in savings for life, a free vitamin organizer, and free shipping (always) on subscription orders over $35 now.

settings.custom_liquid:
<script>
    const productItems = [];

    {% for myProduct in collection.products %}
        {% for variant in myProduct.variants %}
            var item = {
                Name: {{ myProduct.title | json }},
                ProductID: {{ myProduct.id | json }},
                Categories: {{ collection.title | json }},
                ImageURL: "{{ myProduct | image_url: width: 300 }}",
                URL: "{{ shop.secure_url }}" + "{{ variant.url }}",
                Price: {{ myProduct.price | money_without_currency | json }},
                CompareAtPrice: {{ myProduct.compare_at_price_max | money_without_currency | json }},
                VariantID: {{ variant.id }},
                Brand: {{ myProduct.vendor | json }},
                VariantTitle: {{ variant.title | json }},
            };
            productItems.push(item);
        {% endfor %}
    {% endfor %}

    console.log('productItems', productItems);

    var atcs = document.getElementsByClassName("productitem--action-atc");
    for(var i = 0; i < atcs.length; i++){
        atcs[i].addEventListener('click', function() {
            console.log('Add to Cart was clicked!');
            var productVariantId = this.getAttribute("data-variant-id");
            var_learnq = _learnq || [];
            console.log('productVariantId', productVariantId);
            const itemAddedToCart = productItems.filter((item) => parseInt(item.VariantID) === parseInt(productVariantId));
            if(itemAddedToCart && itemAddedToCart.length) {
                console.log('itemAddedToCart', itemAddedToCart[0]);
                _learnq.push(['track', 'Added to Cart', itemAddedToCart[0]]);
            }
        });
    }
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
   var _learnq = _learnq || [];
   _learnq.push(["track", "Viewed Category",{
     "CategoryName": {{ collection.title | json }},
     "CategoryID": "{{ collection.id }}",
     "ImageURL": "{{ collection.featured_image.src | img_url: '300' }}",
     "URL": "{{ collection.url }}"
   }]);
</script>
